title: Frequently asked questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about the platform

faqs.question: What is a DPR?
faqs.answer: A Detailed Project Report (DPR) is a comprehensive document outlining your business plan, financial projections, and funding requirements. It's essential for securing loans and government subsidies.

faqs.question: How accurate are the financial projections?
faqs.answer: Our AI uses industry-standard formulas and benchmarks. You can review and edit all projections before finalizing.

faqs.question: Do banks accept AI-generated DPRs?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our templates follow standard banking formats and include all required sections.

faqs.question: How is pricing calculated?
faqs.answer: Base price varies by template complexity. You can add optional sections, and the final price updates in real-time.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: We use bank-level encryption. Your information is never shared, and you can delete your data anytime.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee if the DPR doesn't meet your expectations.
